name: Elementary Addons
author: BRAFT

sections.description:
Widgets and extensions for Elementor.
Currently, there are only a few of them, but their number is constantly growing, so make sure to drop by from time to time.

Current Widgets in the package:
– Lottie Animation
– dotLottie Animation
– Vertical Accordion
– Simple Menu
– Dynamic Button
– Nested Gallery
– Testimonial Slider
– Panorama 360

Extensions in the package:
– Section Wave Clip Path
sections.installation:
Just like any other WordPress plugin, in the dashboard, navigate to Plugins, Add New and search for Elementary Addons.
Or, if you have the zipped plugin file, in the dashboard, navigate to Plugins, Add New then Upload Plugin button and then follow the instructions.
